title: Contextual Chat AI
summary: Maintains multi-turn conversation memory and context.
architecture: A FastAPI backend that manages conversational state and memory for a multi-turn chat AI. It uses OpenAI's GPT-4 for generating context-aware responses.
responsibilities: Developed the conversation memory module, integrated the GPT-4 API, and built the FastAPI service.

title: Computer Vision Object Detector
summary: Prototype for detecting objects in real-time video streams.
architecture: A real-time object detection system using the YOLOv8 model with PyTorch. The application processes video streams and identifies objects with bounding boxes.
responsibilities: Implemented the YOLOv8 model, fine-tuned it on a custom dataset, and built the video processing pipeline.

title: AI Experiment Dashboard
summary: Centralized dashboard for running and visualizing AI experiments.
architecture: A web-based dashboard built with Next.js and React for managing and visualizing AI model training experiments. D3.js is used for creating interactive charts of training metrics.
responsibilities: Designed the UI/UX for the dashboard, developed the frontend components, and implemented the data visualizations with D3.js.
